evidence: We participated in the Shared Translation Task and submitted translations for EnglishGerman and EnglishFrench .
text: We participated in the Shared Translation Task and submitted translations for EnglishGerman and EnglishFrench .

evidence: We applied POS-based reordering to improve our translations in all directions , using short-range reordering for EnglishFrench and long-range reordering for EnglishGerman .
text: We applied POS-based reordering to improve our translations in all directions , using short-range reordering for EnglishFrench and long-range reordering for EnglishGerman .

evidence: In addition , a parallel phrase scoring technique was implemented that could speed up the MT training process tremendously .
text: In addition , a parallel phrase scoring technique was implemented that could speed up the MT training process tremendously .

evidence: We have presented the systems for our participation in the WMT 2011 Evaluation for EnglishGerman and EnglishFrench .
text: We have presented the systems for our participation in the WMT 2011 Evaluation for EnglishGerman and EnglishFrench .

evidence: A Discriminative Word Alignment Model led to an increase in BLEU for English-German .
text: A Discriminative Word Alignment Model led to an increase in BLEU for English-German .
